Reviews.Title: Good Laptop Great Price
Reviews.Author: WGatlin
Reviews.Content: So I decided I would do a review on here even though I didn't purchase this product from Amazon.I bought this computer from Fry's Electronics today for significantly less than advertised on Amazon or anywhere else for that matter. I picked it up for $315.00 USD with tax, so it seems like I got a really good deal.I'm very impressed with the overall feel and use of the computer, 4 Gigs of ram is a huge plus. The 500 GB drive is great for all the music and video storage needs of today.Seems like it has good battery life so far, not so sure about the 4.5 hours as advertised, I would say it's more along the lines of 3.5 but it all depends on what you do with your computer. Still, I can't complain! The only downside is that it's a Windows 8 machine and windows 8 is designed for touch screen, which this computer does not have. Also, this computer does not include a windows or system restore cd, so if your computer crashes then you better have access to a windows cd or you're in trouble.I would say shop around for the best price because they seem to vary from store to store.The only downside is Windows 8..... I am not a fan so far of the Windows 8 system, it seems to be geared towards social media and not so much a easy to use operating system. If you have the patience to fight with the operating system changes and basically re-learn how to use windows then this is for you.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop at a steal of a price!!!
Reviews.Author: Eric Knighton
Reviews.Content: Like a previous review I read, I bought my NE56R34u from fry's for $289.  With tax it was around $320.  I consider myself a knowledgeable person when it comes to computers and I did my homework on this one.  I was looking for a PC with the new i3 processor for its multi processing capabilities but the B960 process incorporated in this laptop is the equivalent in overall performance.  I am quite happy with the speed and with Windows 8.  I wan not so sure that I was going to be able to adapt to the new interface of Windows, but I really like it.  I do plan on upgrading this PC to a max of 8gig ram to help with the processing power as I use the PC for Pro Tools, which is a pretty demanding piece of software.  So far it handles the software pretty well.  I am hoping that by upgrading the RAM some of the smaller glitches will go away.I would definitely recommend this PC to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Design problems
Reviews.Author: L. Jorgensen
Reviews.Content: My daughter tells me the keys started to fall off the keyboard within two weeks of receiving it. The Geek Squad people told us this was a common problem for this laptop, so we returned it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent For the Money.
Reviews.Author: Doodad
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my girlfriend for Christmas, but not through Amazon. I only paid $290 for it, and luckily it had Windows 7 instead of 8. Also it came with 3 GB of RAM instead of 4; it's still fast enough for HER, but not for me. The boot time is right at a minute, which is OK. It takes our Getacs with i7 processors 55 seconds, by way of comparison. I am upgrading it to 8 gigs soon, so I will let you know how quickly it boots then...if I remember, that is.This is a solidly built laptop with a glossy black finish. It looks good, the screen is huge, and it blessedly has the 10-key number pad, which my $1,200 work laptop lacks for some reason...No backlit keys, but really, who needs them? The speakers are cookie-cutter laptop, meaning they suck. But for $10 one can go down to the nearest electronics retailer and buy some peripheral speakers. The screen itself is great. The viewing angles are huge, which is helped by the LCD being backed by LEDs.I am a processor snob and vastly prefer AMD processors, but this little dual core Intel is fast, especially given the underwhelming 3 GB of RAM that came with it. It does have a ton of "bloatware" on it, which I immediately took off using CCleaner. No need to format and do a clean install, in my humble opinion. I had a time getting the Gateway Backup application to work, so I had to use Windows Backup for the rescue disks. It froze on the last disk anyway, and I tried hard closing it in Task Manager, that did not work, but it finished anyway. I don't know if the 4th disk worked correctly, so I must do it again. I am not a fan of Norton (Symantec) and I got rid of that as well. Try uninstalling Norton and you'll understand why I don't like it. It takes more than one try to get rid of it.It definitely needs a chill pad as any laptop does, but all around it was a very good deal. I seriously doubt that it will serve as a serious gaming laptop, but neither would my work laptop that sports an i5 processor. I don't get the consumer/manufacturer love affair with those processors, as they are much slower than my 2 year-old, non-modded A6 quad core. Even the i7, which we have on our military grade laptops, doesn't impress me. IMO, Intels are as overrated as Mac products, which have failed to awe me, especially to justify spending 4 times what I paid for this one.I will answer any questions, unless they are Windows 8 questions. The only experience I have with it is when I was shopping for THIS laptop.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: chels_21
Reviews.Content: First off, I paid $367 for this laptop including shipping in October 2012... so I'm not sure why it's listed at $40+ more expensive almost 1 1/2 years later (I'm updating/rewriting this review... February 2014). I got this laptop to replace my 4 year old Acer. I have not been impressed with Gateway, and Windows 8 is a pain in the @$$ (I realize this isn't Gateway's fault).My 3 overall complaints:1) The time on this thing is never right! Every time I let it sit and come back to it, usually over night, the time changes itself to 2 hours behind, and I have to change it back manually. Not really a major issue, but it is annoying and I'm not going to lie... it's had me thinking it's 2 hours earlier in the day than it actually is more than once.2) The battery life isn't great. On a full battery just surfing the web/Facebooking, the battery lasts about 2 hours tops.3) Start up has never been an easy task. I don't shut it down as often as I should, like overnight... I usually just close the lid and let it hibernate. It's always taken several minutes to wake up, and I have to type in my password 2-3 times due to the fact that it lags when typing it in. If the battery dies while I'm using it, for example, it takes another several minutes to get the screen to turn back on. Usually I end up having to hold down the on/off button to reboot, because pushing the space bar or the on/off button one time doesn't wake it up.A year and a half ago this computer was an upgrade to my 4 year old Acer, that was so slow by that point I could barely get it to start up. But now, a year and a half later, I can clearly see that the Acer was a better computer in general. It took twice as much time to get to the point that this one is getting to already (slow and misbehaving, freezing a lot). If you're buying this for the Gateway brand, or if you've never tried a Gateway and are thinking about switching, I suggest researching other models instead of/on top of Gateway. I highly recommend Acer.

Reviews.Title: Random shutdowns
Reviews.Author: Thomas Lombardo
Reviews.Content: It worked well for a few days, but then began shutting down at random times. I made sure all the power settings said never to shut down automatically. Gateway support suggested resetting the BIOS, which I did, but that didn't solve it. I had to send it back to them (and I paid the shipping, even though it failed after only a week!) They sent it back a week later, and the problem just occurred again yesterday (two weeks after we got it back.) I'm calling this a lemon.Update:After sending it back TWICE, the problem persists. Gateway refuses to refund or replace, even though the second time it was in for a repair they couldn't reproduce the problem. Amazon says that my window of opportunity to return the item expired. (Hey, I've been trying to get it repaired!!)Another update:Third time's a charm, right? Maybe not.The first time I sent it back they replaced the hard drive.The second time I sent it back they couldn't reproduce the problem (they left it on for 24 hours), so they returned it with no changes.The third time I sent it back they ... wait for it ... replaced the hard drive. Yes, the same thing that didn't fix the problem the first time. Folks, something is telling this computer to shut itself down and I'm pretty sure it's NOT the hard drive.Have I mentioned that I'LL NEVER BUY ANOTHER GATEWAY PRODUCT AGAIN?Final update: After the 4th return (this time they replaced the motherboard/CPU), we got it back on Friday, unpacked it Saturday, and within an hour it failed again. Back to Gateway's customer service to fill out a report. Monday I get an email from Gateway saying they can't process our request, and they give an 800 # to call. I call, give the serial # of our computer, and the automated service responds, "That's not an Acer product. We can't help you." (Acer bought Gateway and now handles their service.)Fed up, I contacted Amazon. Their return policy says 30 days and we're way past that. I explained the situation, pointed out that I've bought a lot of technology through Amazon, and said that if I didn't get satisfaction out of this situation that I would never buy another computer or expensive item from Amazon again.Within two hours I received a reply from Amazon saying that although it's against their policy, they would grant an exception in this case. They even sent me a free shipping label so I could return the computer to Amazon and get a full refund.So kudos to Amazon.com for still caring about its customers (even if all they were responding to was a threat), and a one-finger salute to Gateway/Acer for making crappy products and providing even worse customer service.

Reviews.Title: So Pleased!
Reviews.Author: J. Stewart
Reviews.Content: I weighed this purchase heavily, looking up all reviews I could find.  I'm glad a researched this item, and can tell you it's worth the investment.  This laptop was a replacement for a $1000 plus one that quit on me.  I am so pleased, it's working great.  Windows 8 isn't any better or worse than any other Windows version I've tried.

Reviews.Title: Great bang for the buck!
Reviews.Author: Jessica Foster
Reviews.Content: This computer offers everything a computer 3 times the price can. My 18 year old daughter wanted a MacBook Pro. I was unwilling to spend that kind of money for a laptop so I did a lot of research and with the help of the many reviews I read from others who had purchased this laptop, I chose this one. Well, my daughter was dissapointed for a half a second because when she turned this one on she raved about how great it was and was even better than the Mac. The screen display was impressive and 2 months later and she still "loves it'! I never told her the price ;)

Reviews.Title: This laptop is awesome
Reviews.Author: D. Mayer "just a fan"
Reviews.Content: When my latest desktop computer died, I decided to join the 21st century and buy a laptop.  Expecting to pay twice as much, I was very pleasantly suprised to find this Gateway priced under $350, and I have yet to find anything it can't do.  The computer recognizes almost all my peripherals and finds drivers for them automatically.  Internet access is easy and fast.  The 450 GB of usable hard disk space is larger than my previous drive plus 2 backup drives combined.  Very acceptable screen size and very lightweight.  Runs cool enough to keep in my lap without any discomfort.  The built-in DVD player recognizes and plays all my DVDs and CDs, even the homemade ones, and automatically displays the closed captioning for us deaf guys.  I have always kept it plugged in, so don't know about battery life yet.  Would have been nice to get Microsoft Office suite, but I was able to load an old version of Office XP that I had purchased a few years ago.  I preferred the older versions of Windows Media Player, but that's not the computer's fault.  Not a big fan of Windows 8, but getting used to it - took me a while to configure my desktop to look like my old one.  And I uninstalled a lot of the prepackaged software tools, utilities and links.  The installed pdf reader is literally useless, but it's easy to download a free one from Adobe.  Only nuisance is the DVD door - it is right where I pick it up, so always popping it open accidentally.  Only had it a few weeks, but so far, best computer I have ever owned.

Reviews.Title: very poor wireless performance
Reviews.Author: Helen Jo
Reviews.Content: I am unsure as to if I am just unlucky and have a poor wireless chipset or if there is something more amiss. The wireless browsing of the internet is slow at best. It often times out. By plugging in an ethernet cable it works just dandy. Despite my great knowledge of these little babies if a hardened developer cannot get the wifi to work there is either.1) bad chipset ( mine is the broadcom one)or2) missing firmware update.I have contacted Gateway and am awaiting a response. But I expect that I will have to return this laptop and seek out another for my daughter.I never did return this item. Gateway gave me the run around , restore to factory defaults, stand on one leg and hop up and down whilst chanting I shall not complain. None of their suggestions worked. As for myself I will never buy from Gateway again and nor will the company I work for. There has to be some upside to working in IT and not supporting gateway is one of them.Do not buy this model.update Nov 1st 2013even with new windows 8.1 updates , no wifithis really is so upsetting.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: ALEXA "ALEXA OAKS"
Reviews.Content: I more than love it. It is perfect. More than I expected. Windows 8 is great as well. The price was awesome!

Reviews.Title: Frustrating Software Issues
Reviews.Author: Jeannine M Boscia
Reviews.Content: I really deliberated before purchasing a laptop with Windows 8.  I should have deliberated longer and maybe I would have decided on Windows 7. I do not know if it is the combination of this Gateway laptop AND Windows 8, but I am having so many software issues that I decided to go back to using my old reliable HP laptop with Windows Vista. Troubles I have encountered are mostly related to installing & uninstalling software (I get an error every time with any program), Adobe Flash (does not work and I have tried various versions of Flash with various versions of browsers (IE, Foxfire, Chrome).

Reviews.Title: Solid
Reviews.Author: Gate-way
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer on sale for under $300.00 locally but thought I would review it here also. One big plus is that it comes with 4G memory in ONE slot so you can upgrade another 4g. I bought a 4g stick for under $20.00 and put it in the available slot, very easy. I wiped wind blows 8 off the drive and installed Linux Mint 13 with no problems. I have been using this set-up for a couple of weeks and it's solid and very fast.

Reviews.Title: Great PC, great Price
Reviews.Author: Harvey Rubin "video maven"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an affordable, reasonably fast, easy to use PC for my wife. I found the Gateway NE56R34u 15.6" laptop at a great price at amazon.com. As usual with amazon.com, delivery was quick. The PC worked right out of the box, which is always a good sign. The 15.6" screen is perfect, and the performance is just right. It came with Windows 8, which takes a little getting used to. There is no user manual, but there is a cheat sheet that comes with the unit. It is very helpful, but not needed once you get the hang of the Windows 8 user interface. I highly recommend this PC to anyone looking for a moderately priced unit that does the job.

Reviews.Title: Good laptop, almost great
Reviews.Author: pledd
Reviews.Content: the laptop is a great buy, the only real issue I've had with it is the speakers, they're ok just not great. otherwise, I love windows 8m, it's pretty fast, and it's a good size. I would recommend it if your looking for something not as expensive but still great!

Reviews.Title: Big fan
Reviews.Author: Durley Minniece
Reviews.Content: After my 10 year old Gateway desk top computer started going out, I knew it was time for another.  This time I wanted a laptop.  After weeks of research I decided on another Gateway. I have it for a few months now.  It works great and price was great too.  It has Windows 8 which I was initially intimidated by, but I spent and hour playing with it and was able to figure it out and I love it!

Reviews.Title: Awesome computer with excellent price.
Reviews.Author: Thorough Customer "Thorough Customer"
Reviews.Content: What can I say besides extremely satisfied.  I owned gateway before they were taken over due to the fact I am a diehard AMD fan.  The price point cannot be touched on this product.  Great memory, hd, hdmi slots, cd/dvd burner, external card slot, webcam. etc.  This has all the bells and whistles at an awesome price.

Reviews.Title: A risk worth taking.
Reviews.Author: KSW
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop not too long ago and it is perfect! I had seen the reviews that people said about Windows 8 and all, but when I got it I had no issues! I love the Windows 8 because it has certain apps that I need and it's great for multi-tasking coming from a person who multi tasks a lot. I love the microphones in this laptop because it can pick up my voice very easily. On this old laptop I had I had to get my face very close to the built in microphones because it couldn't hear me well. But this laptop has a great webcam which is a good thing because I do use this laptop for my own personal use and not just my school work. This is my first time ever getting a computer that wasn't made by HP which I have stopped using HP because they have heating problems.  I love every inch of this laptop from it's HD screen, to it's fast and smooth way of working. It's easy to use and very fast! But that is just my opinion, some people think otherwise. But I am very glad that I went with my gut and got this laptop because it is excellent in every way!

Reviews.Title: I like the computer, but,
Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: I hate Windows 8. The computer is set very fine, when it comes to the cursor landing on an icon. The program begins before you have a chance to hit the left button. This causes the wrong program to work, since you "brushed" over it. I have solved this problem by adding a wireless mouse. I know the computer is designed with a finger pad, but the mouse gives me much better control, and the programs only begin when I hit the button. The mouse overrides the finger pad, but both still work at the same time. The laptop was priced nicely, so that is why I bought it. I would have gone with a tablet, but the price and hard disk capacity were the main factors why I went with the laptop.

Reviews.Title: I fell in Love
Reviews.Author: B. Dail "Starlight"
Reviews.Content: This is the best laptop I have ever had bar none.  Don't let the Windows 8 scare you off because if I can figure it out and have so much fun with it anyone can.  I find myself playing with a lot more gadgets than any of my previous laptops because of the ease to fix what I mess up even when the instructions are very clear.  I would recommend this Gateway to anyone that wants to update and get a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Piece of Junk
Reviews.Author: Dustin
Reviews.Content: This crappy laptop would not start after about a week's use. Do not buy this laptop, especially from Flower-Electronics who refused to give me a refund. I was robbed of $350 by Flower-Electronics and Amazon who denied my A-to-z Guarantee claim which I am currently appealing. What a waste of time and money this experience has been. Up until now, my experience with amazon has been a positive one. I hope my appeal is approved and I receive my full refund or else I will never do business with amazon again and I would warn others not to do business with amazon. I paid FedEx to return the laptop to Flower-Electronics who wanted me to remove my bad review of them. Hah!

Reviews.Title: Inadequate Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Jeanne M. Johnson
Reviews.Content: I had to return it because I could not get it registered. After a month waiting, I found that I couldn't get a full refund and lost money.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointing laptop
Reviews.Author: M. Weaver "Inkwell"
Reviews.Content: This Gateway has been a horror show since we got it.  Windows 8 doesn't really work on the hardware; the WiFi is just plain flaky; is has issues with startup and shut down; if you let it go into sleep mode it sucks you into its nightmare. The only difference is that you will eventually wake up, unlike this laptop.  The only way I go the wireless working (sort of - it always loses its connection after an hour and has to be rebooted) was to hunt down and turn off EVERY power-saving setting, starting with the wifi card.It's also very slow; the HDD is just poky.  It would be OK for a little old lady who only did email and was using an ethernet cable, IF you secretly hated her and wanted to make her life a living hell.On the plus side, I had my window open and when a breeze blew in all the papers I had underneath it didn't blow away.Whoever designed this thing is a birdbrain, and I mean that as an insult to the birds.Gateway NE56R34u 15.6-Inch Laptop (Black)

Reviews.Title: Easy transition from former laptop
Reviews.Author: Pamela @ West Mansfield
Reviews.Content: Love my new laptop... it's very comfortable to use,fast processing,great features and perfect size...Would definitely recommend it to a friend or family!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Karl Krispin
Reviews.Content: Everything was perfect, on time and fullfilled my requirements. The product was OK. I have no complaints at all KK

Reviews.Title: Great Lap Top for the Price
Reviews.Author: Pro
Reviews.Content: You can not beat the price.  I would not get a refurbished or used laptop, there is no need.  I love the fact that it boots up so quickly, the key board is large with a 10 key area, it's light weight and I throw it in my messenger bag without issues, the clarity of the screen is great.It comes with windows 8, it's kool but not so kool but that's not Gateways fault.Great product with a great price!

Reviews.Title: Gateway 15.6 Laptop
Reviews.Author: Katherine Ballew
Reviews.Content: We have only owned the laptop for a few weeks, but so far it appears to be a great computer, especially for the price!  Definitely an upgrade if you have not puchased a new computer in the last 4 or 5 years.  Has all the bells and whistles necessary for the everday user, probably not suitable for the avid gamer.  Obviously you get what you pay for, so don't expect this computer to be anything special, just the bare essentials.

Reviews.Title: very good value
Reviews.Author: Darrel Untereker
Reviews.Content: I got this computer as a present for my sister-in-law.  I thought it was the best value among the five or so that I looked at in this price range.  She has reported that it is working very well for her.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: JAEMIE MORGAN
Reviews.Content: so far all is well, happy with the speed that has this labtop. Window 8 is a bit complicated I think I can learn the program. Labtop looks great I have no complaints about it.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price and function
Reviews.Author: Dave F
Reviews.Content: Worked right out of the box. Like the large screen and it works great. No problems or complaints. I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Elaine
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews before having purchased this computer, and am not disappointed. It does have a number pad, which I love, but it would have been nice to have backlit keys.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop for the price
Reviews.Author: Janice Micetic
Reviews.Content: I use the laptop for personal and home office purposes.  It meets all of my needs.  I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a an inexpensive serviceable pc.

Reviews.Title: Gateway Computer Purchase
Reviews.Author: D. Jackson "Freelance Editor"
Reviews.Content: Love this computer. Windows 8 takes some getting used to, but once you get the hang of it, it's OK. The computer has everything I need, and it's fast. All for a great price, too.

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY GATEWAY
Reviews.Author: Katie Kilgore
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with my purchase of my Gateway. Very maneuver around. Takes a while to learn the setup with it being windows 8 but I love it.

Reviews.Title: Gateway made by Acer -- its  A  Ok
Reviews.Author: JmC
Reviews.Content: For some reason the computer drive lists 450 GB,instead of the advertised 500 GB.It works as expected, the battery life is about 2.5 - 3.5 hours depending upon usage.It takes a while to get adjusted to the new Win 8, I'd of course prefer the Windows 7 start button and regular setup, BUT it seems as if this is the way Microsoft wants to go.If its not broken don't fix it.Other reviewers have listed lower prices, but Best Buy was out of stock on this model, and once you add taxes, gas to drive there,it's just cheaper to buy it from Amazon.UPDATEafter 4 months of use my e and r are starting to fade,I'm sure they'll consider this a usage issue and won't replace the affected keys.I would suggest a larger hard drive if you're using it as a desktop replacement.I increased the memory to 8 gb, 4 is just too little.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Robinson Inciarte
Reviews.Content: this product is perfect, reliable, safe, I can recommend, is fast, isprompt, is express, is short, is economicpaying

Reviews.Title: the area of touch pad
Reviews.Author: carmelo moreno
Reviews.Content: i don't like the position of the touch pad área because is not the centre of the laptopis too much left and is not confortable

Reviews.Title: excellent buy for the price
Reviews.Author: Margaret Madison
Reviews.Content: This was a gift and the person that received it love it.  It was a big step up from the laptop that he previous own

Reviews.Title: Versatile and powerful for $$$
Reviews.Author: RevJohn70
Reviews.Content: This cheap little laptop is fantastic for what we use it for. Purchased for my wife to use while she went back to college for a Master degree. Not only does it run smoothly and efficiently, it does so with multiple programs operating.It is also extremely lightweight, and the built in wifi picks up even "poor" signals well.Well worth the $$.

Reviews.Title: Not what I thought
Reviews.Author: Shanie "Mother of 4. Married 18 years. Zumba ...
Reviews.Content: I purposely avoided buying an Acer, having been told that the versions under $500 are mass produced and have more breakage and problems. I had no idea Gateway and Acer are one and the same. I wish that had been listed somewhere in the description. I found this computer to be slow, I had trouble restoring my files from Carbonite on to it, and Windows 8 is hard to figure out. The computer frame was plastic, like most computers under $500. So, I sent it back and purchased an HP with Beats Audio and Windows 7 and a steel frame. I spent about $150 more, but felt the durability, performance and ease of use would be well worth it in the end.

Reviews.Title: Excellent workhorse for the daily grind
Reviews.Author: arejay1984
Reviews.Content: I love this laptop. I use it primarily for homework (adult degree completion program), and for blogging, Internet surfing, and some gaming. The screen is gorgeous. I use a dual monitor setup and now I need to purchase a newer second monitor because it looks old and dull next to the HD screen on the Gateway. I love having the 10-key pad. As for Windows 8, once you begin using it, it becomes second nature. No, I don't love Windows 8, but at least it has a shallow learning curve. My only complaint regarding the laptop has to do with the touchpad. The mouse keys begin to feel a little loose already. However, I typically use a wireless mouse anyway, so this is only a minor annoyance. All in all, I am pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: For the price, this is a great computer
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: You can't beat the price of this laptop.  My kids need something to surf the internet and do some homework.  They are always fighting for my computer.  This gives us another option and they think the laptop is cool.

Reviews.Title: POS
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I bought this based on the other consumer reviews.  I've had this computer for about 15 months now and I've already had to change the bottom plastic tray a few months back.  Well, today it broke again in the same place, which is the part that holds the bracket for the monitor.  The lousy plastic tray is $35 and being that this is the second time now in such a short period of time, I anticipate having to replace it again sometime in the future.  I also have to replace the network adapter now too.  I should have spent more money on a better computer and not had to deal with the added hassle of having to change out parts.Steer clear of Gateway products!!!

Reviews.Title: Swapped Windows 8 for Windows 7
Reviews.Author: Georb
Reviews.Content: Got this computer for my dad. As soon as I got it I removed Windows 8 and installed Windows 7. I just don't see a reason to use Windows 8 on a computer that doesn't have a touch screen. I didn't have any trouble locating and installing the drivers for this computer.It has been working well without any issues for him for over a year now. I've not had to fix any major issues with it for him.I will not that when handling this laptop it does feel a bit on the fragile side. My dad does not carry it anywhere and basically uses it as a desktop that he can take from the office to the living room. So I'm not sure how well it would handle heavier use.Overall, it is a good computer for the price and runs Windows 7 without any problems.Note: If you plan to put Windows 7 on it make sure you know how to remove Windows 8 i.e. disabling the UEFI and such.

Reviews.Title: No issues
Reviews.Author: Satesh N.
Reviews.Content: Overall a good choice for its price. It came with windows 8 and performs without delay. Only had one software issue where it was not detecting the actual hard drive space. But that error occurred once when trying to store some pictures to the laptop. the camera works good for skype and I use it everyday at work. I have not come across any problems with it so far and watch alot of movies and shows with no hold-backs.

Reviews.Title: Worse computer have ever seen with Windows 8 .
Reviews.Author: Adnan Nazir
Reviews.Content: I will throw it in trash. Window 8 is just not user friendly, computer itself is heavy, A total waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Shaunna514 "-Shaunna"
Reviews.Content: I have had the computer for over a year and I haven't had any problems with it. I don't know all the technical information about it but I do know that it does what I need it to do. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: teapot "teapot"
Reviews.Content: Love love love the quality of this computer for the price.  Very nice.  Only problems for me, I do not like the apps page that annoys me coming up.  I guess you could set it to skip that page if you were more computer savvy than me.  I also can not find any where to write on it, like word or office program.  I did not think any computer would not have that, isn't that basic.  It may be there and I just can not find it, but you may want to check before buying.  I wish if anyone would buy it they would tell me on review if there is one and where to look.  It has Windows 8. Still love it though, very nice.  It is much nicer than my comparably priced HP that I bought 1 year before.I had a HP laptop that lasted for 8 years.

Reviews.Title: Read description carefully
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: I would rate this laptop higher, except I just assumed it would be on the keyboard. This keyboard is not lit. That doesn't mean it's a bad laptop, it just means I should have paid more attention to the description. The biggest problem I have with this laptop is that it came with Windows 8, which is very confusing for people like me who like things easy.

Reviews.Title: Gateway NE56R34 - already out for repair.
Reviews.Author: frugal but not cheap "Frugal but not cheap gal"
Reviews.Content: I don't consider this a lap top. Not for my lap. It's big. I've had it for a few months. Was working normally, put computer down, came back an hour later, key board has malfunctioned. I sent it back today to have the keyboard . Also, the volume is very low. I checked every volume type setting. I have to hook it to an external speaker to get the volume to a decent level.

Reviews.Title: Love it, works great
Reviews.Author: Demo Dandy
Reviews.Content: Recieve the Notebook ontime as stated with Prime. The Notebook has been working fine. Very fast for school work and entertainment. No complain.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money on it.
Reviews.Author: Andrew Acord
Reviews.Content: No wonder gateway tanked.  Since I bought this new 1. The computer randomly turns on with the "hotkeys" enabled, when you go to type after getting on the internet, it starts switching all over the place.  Only solution is to restart it and hope it goes away.  2. Half the time it won't fully boot up, and will just sit on a black screen until you hard kill it and reboot it.  It is only 8 months old.  I will never buy another gateway product again, you get what you pay for.  Oh, and the B960 processor won't run a virtual OS on it as well, something they fail to mention when buying.  For the average user it shouldn't be a problem, but it would be nive to know this stuff before buying it.

Reviews.Title: You don't get better than this for the price!
Reviews.Author: hanna banana "hanna banana"
Reviews.Content: This is great for university students. Has everything you need. After four months, I do not regret this purchase. I use mine daily, and its on for days at a time without any problems. Its pretty fast too, but the price was the best part. Well done Gateway! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

Reviews.Title: Not for me
Reviews.Author: Danielle
Reviews.Content: I have had this laptop for about a year and I have not been satisfied with it for essentially the whole time.  I got it because it was on sale at target for about $250, and I certainly got what I paid for.  While the machine does basically what I ask of it, what I dislike most about it is the way it works and feels.  The keyboard feels extremely cheap and like the keys will fall off at any time.  The track pad seems to have a mind of its own.  If I somehow manage to touch it a certain way, whole new screens and windows will pop up.  I don't know how I got there, what it was, or how to do it again if I wanted to.  Putting the cursor in certain corners, (or sometimes around the right edge... but not all the time) in just the right way will cause certain menu items to show up, although I have no desire for them.  It all seems so random, I can't figure it out.  The speakers are pathetic and are always at 100% and I can still never hear anything, unless the room is dead silent.  Not to mention it comes with Windows 8, which we all know is the worst.  It is especially challenging with this crazy track pad.  Really, go look for a different computer.

Reviews.Title: Review of Gateway NE56R34u 15.6-inch Laptop (Black)
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: I like this laptop. it was windows 8 and I didn't mind it at all. I upgraded to 8.1 and the computer is working fine for the purpose I wanted it for.The speaker quality is really poor, could be much better. The charger is taking quite a while to charge and it seems to discharge pretty quickly.Overall functionality is good though.

Reviews.Title: GREAT for School
Reviews.Author: Pbails
Reviews.Content: If you need something that you're just going to use for connecting to the internet and working with an office suite, then there's really no need to spend any more money.  This is a quality laptop.  We have two in my household.  I have a slightly older, but essentially the same, model that I used through grad school and now at my work and my wife uses this for her grad work.  Large screen, fast enough processor and plenty of room on the hard drive for school work.  I even run a couple of my games in low graphics mode when I'm away from my home gaming system.

Reviews.Title: Gateway is awesome
Reviews.Author: Kendi
Reviews.Content: I love gateway. They make very good products that last. Maybe it doesn't sell them many quantities of computers since they don't break, but when I need new computers from time to time for various reasons, I always look for a gateway first.Uses windows 8, which I'm not a huge fan of.Great laptop.

Reviews.Title: Wifi :(
Reviews.Author: Cristina
Reviews.Content: This would be a wonderful computer....if the wifi worked. First couple months was fine. Than bam! Every time i try to contact the whole laptop freezes. Booooo!

Reviews.Title: Pacific Tech is a joke
Reviews.Author: Troy Dircks
Reviews.Content: I ordered this Laptop and they didn't have any in stock but thought it would be a good idea to sell laptops anyway. This could be a good computer but I warn all of you the Pacific Tech is a horrible company. Their service was very poor.

Reviews.Title: not worth low price
Reviews.Author: Mark LoForte
Reviews.Content: Bought this notebook brand new for my girlfriend for Christmas.  Processing speed was adequate.  However, the new Windows is terrible.  Sometimes it switches between apps/programs when you aren't even touching it.  The webcam is worse than the webcam I used in 2005.  Girlfriend really wanted to start a youtube channel and was super disappointed in the quality of this product.  I am going to return it for a full refund and just save up for an Apple computer.  My iphone is a better computer than this product will ever be.

Reviews.Title: Its allright
Reviews.Author: XxKingJosephxX
Reviews.Content: I dont know if its because its new, but when I watch Youtube videos sometimes videos blurred out and wont load.But I was using internet explorer, after I download it google chrome everything was good. Besides that, Love it thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy
Reviews.Author: Nancy A. Hankel
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my husband for Christmas.  He is used to a desktop and he is figuring out all the ins and outs of not using a mouse.  I am going to purchase the mouse for him, it will be easier for him.  Make sure you charge is completely 1st!!

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: John W.
Reviews.Content: Great deal fast for movies, gaming and just what ever very nice thanks don't forget the protection plan I've had no problems but you never know.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Golf247
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a buddy of mine. So far I think he likes. It was cheap enough for him to buy.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Christmas
Reviews.Author: LiteratureMan
Reviews.Content: The Gateway NE56R34u is fantastic.  When I am away from home, it is perfect to get my homework done and remain in touch with family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Great Price bette performance
Reviews.Author: Danielle R. Frederick "swexy0"
Reviews.Content: It has been a year and this is going great only problem is one of the arrow keys cam out....I love it

Reviews.Title: Constantly freezes and reboots after 2 months
Reviews.Author: Donna Racine
Reviews.Content: September 2013 I bought this for my daughter to use for college. In Novemeber 2013 it freezes all the time and reboots to the point it can't even be used. I tried to return it or exchange it but it is past the returns date for amazon. I don't have the money to buy another one, so I am not sure what I am going to do about that. Even if you are a shoestring budget like I am do not buy this computer, somehow save up the money and buy something better than this gateway.

Reviews.Title: If you like Windows 8
Reviews.Author: therr
Reviews.Content: Not a fan of Windows 8, but this laptop was great on value and does what i need it for.

Reviews.Title: keyboard cheap and will not work proper
Reviews.Author: cepet "cepet"
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed with the cheap keyboard and mousepad on this computer. I actually have seen toy computer keyboards that were much better!I noticed problems with the keyboard from day one, but did not return it immediately..MICROCOM TECHNOLOGY.who I purchased from through Amazon was happy to tell me that they WILL NOT do anything as far as exchange, refund, or even send a keyboard replacement. Keys are falling off, sticking. The spacebar does not work, so all words are jammed together.Amazon, again has not come through for me as well. I purchase a lot through Amazon, and beginning to think I might have to look for another place on line to buy things and spend my hard earned money.So...must go through the manufacturer just 6 months after purchasing. I still have new labels on it and MICROCOM TECHNOLOGY wants nothing to do with me.Oh well....Dear Consumers....be warned....

Reviews.Title: Great Product low cost
Reviews.Author: Lonney Steeves
Reviews.Content: Have owned several Gateway laptops and have alway found them great.  This one is the same. Easy to use and to learn features.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: huntinhillbille
Reviews.Content: this great for the price I use it for surfing the web facebook making dvd videos emailing gateway has always been good lap tops for me I have nothing bad to say for now

Reviews.Title: gateway laptop
Reviews.Author: Diane L. Holladay
Reviews.Content: I ordered this Gateway Laptop after my Gateway desk top died 11 yrs after I bought it. I LOVED that desk top and wanted another gateway. Well the laptop has been on the shop 3 times. I dont know what is wrong they keep saying it passes all tests. But while in use, the curser jumps around and puts letters on random lines. its very irritating as I have to start over. Since they say nothing is wrong, I assume maybe its the placement of the mousepad. I am left handed but try not to run my palm over the mousepad. Impossible!!! Maybe gateway will start making left handed laptops!

Reviews.Title: Would have rated 5 stars but......
Reviews.Author: Kurt Porta
Reviews.Content: I'm pleased with the NE56R34u. It boots up fairly quickly and handles web surfing and spreadsheets well. I'm glad I went with a laptop with a 2.2 GHZ processor and I like that it has a few hdmi inputs as well as an input to hook up my old monitor. Windows 8 was confusing at first but I've learned just to use the desktop "charm" and then it feels like previous versions of Windows. I would have given 5 stars but about 2 weeks after the purchase I got the dreaded blank blue screen. I contacted gateway support via the internet with my old desktop. Gateway tech support through chat guided me through a BIOS reset. It got Windows 8 going again but the support person from the chat wasn't able to assure me that the blue screen issue would happen again.

Reviews.Title: Webcam doesn't work
Reviews.Author: H.Zhizhong
Reviews.Content: I recently bought a laptop on Amazon, but when I get the item and open it's all okay but webcam not. webcam doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: The product lived up to the hype
Reviews.Author: Ron Ferro
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer for my son, who is in college now.  I trust the Gateway line because of past experiences. The screen is a good size, the motion of videos are fluid, and not jumpy.

Reviews.Title: LAPTOP
Reviews.Author: Mike Honsberger
Reviews.Content: Nick did a great job standing behind his sales.  I experienced issues with Windows 8 corrupting my harddrive.  After several attempts to solve the problem with Nick's support, Nick decided it was best to return the corrupted unit and ship a replacement unit.  Based upon Nick's personal attention to this matter and his follow through, I would highly reccommend his business.

Reviews.Title: should not have switched from my original brand.
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: I am not impressed with this product at all. It is very difficult to navigate for someone who is not  computer smart. I am sorry I left Dell for Gateway.Dee

Reviews.Title: Great, fast budget laptop!
Reviews.Author: Sheldon
Reviews.Content: Excellent budget laptop, got it as a manufacturer refurbished with 90 day warranty, have had no problems with it at all. It's quick has good specs., versatile and very nice to use. I would definitely recommend this laptop to anyone looking for a good reliable & inexpensive laptop for home use.

Reviews.Title: best delivery best product
Reviews.Author: revance
Reviews.Content: much better than any laptop ive owned best delivery time ever great product works fast and very efficient slim design light weight

Reviews.Title: Great purchase.
Reviews.Author: george
Reviews.Content: I have had my new Gateway for three weeks and I am impressed . Good computer at the right price. Windows 8 took a little getting used to, but the tutorial made things right in understanding the changes .  Feel confident if you decide to buy this model.

Reviews.Title: Poor placement of mouse and jumpy keyboard
Reviews.Author: Aviva Gittle Publishing
Reviews.Content: It would have 2 stars, but it was a great price. If I were reviewing it along with the pre-installed Windows 8 it would be 2 stars.But, I'm going to separate out the machine from the operating system.Likes: monitor size and screen quality (although there is glare, but they all seem to have that), number keyboard, feel of keyboard, fairly lightweight (for a larger size laptop).Dislikes: the mouse seems to be placed too far to the left. Also, if you don't click it in the far lower left right corner, it is very difficult to push. Carpal tunnel syndrome here I come!Let's talk about Windows 8 for a moment, shall we? I could learn to live with Windows 8. It's just different and takes getting used to (I had that issue when MS Office revamped their interface years ago...and now it's no big deal). But, Corel X5 would not work on it. Which I only needed to load so I could upgrade to X6 which does work on Wndows 8. (See my CorelDraw X6 review for the full rant on that issue.)I made the mistake of trying to change the operating system myself. I won't bore you with the gory details. Bottom line: I had to pay a pro to fix the mess I made. I now have Windows 7 Ultimate 64-bit OS loaded and I'm happier camper.Amazon does not let you return computers unless there is something wrong with them. This is a good deal; just make sure the programs you want to use work on Windows 8. If you're not sure, buy a Windows 7 computer. It's easier to upgrade than to downgrade.One more piece of somewhat unrelated advice: Back up all of your files on an external hard drive or in the cloud (dropbox.com is good) before you change your operating system. I hear all you techie guys laughing. Go ahead; that's why we pay you the big bucks. :-)

Reviews.Title: Just for the price
Reviews.Author: faviorc2
Reviews.Content: Is a cheap computer for what it offers. Sometimes the touchpad stops but very rarely. I recommend this product for people who need a basic computer for basic usage

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: JojO
Reviews.Content: Well I have always been a gateway fan and I believe this is a great laptop. No problems as yet. This is also the first time I am using the new Windows 7 and at 1st it seemed confusing. Now its no problem at all.

Reviews.Title: remarkable laptop
Reviews.Author: Juniper "Juniper"
Reviews.Content: excellent performance for the price, very pleased with this purchase.  Windows 8 and touchpad have tablet responsive features for scrolling or zooming in /out

Reviews.Title: Squishy mouse clicks and finicky touch pad, glitchy video card and where the heck are my F keys?!
Reviews.Author: Karen Lorraine Merton
Reviews.Content: Not a fan, really.  For one, could Windows 8 be any more ridiculously frilly?  But beyond that (since an operating system can be changed out), I'll mention problems with the actual laptop.  I haven't had it that long and it's not that it's awful, but I am NO fan.  The left and right mouse clickers are squishy and annoyingly difficult to get quick reactions on for double clicking.  The actual touch censor pad- ESPECIALLY when first opening the laptop- seems quite slow to respond. Between the slow response of both the mouse and cursor, I cannot tell you how many times I have clicked on stupid ads and whatnot on the tops and edges of a screen.  Quite annoying, really.  And the F keys no longer function as the primary key!  Perhaps that is fairly common now, it's been a few years since I had to buy a laptop, but I use the F keys all the time and now have to fold the function key to operate them.  Also (VERY annoying), I have to hold the function to operate the "home" and "end" keys and a number of other things, so just be sure to analyze the picture of the key pad before you purchase it to be sure you like the layout.  The only thing I was looking for was the number keypad, which is present and nice to have.  One more thing, I use Photoshop A LOT and have noticed some glitches there.  It's difficult to explain the exact things it's doing, but it does strange things for some cropping work or when initially opening multiple images (and I have used PS for YEARS on a number of different computers and never had this problem).  I THINK it's the video card not handling the program well, but it COULD be the new Windows.  Beyond that, it's a basic laptop and seems to function alright.  But I REALLY wish I hadn't spilled coffee on my old one:/

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!! ...but windows 8 gets 0 stars
Reviews.Author: OCT55
Reviews.Content: I bought this pc at best buy for 229 dollars..but I have to write about it ...specially when it comes to windows 8..this is a very solid and beautiful laptop extremely fast keys are perfect for me a little too even and flat but not a problem intel corei3 hd graphics 4000 perfect, size perfect, internet connection fast, screen amazing battery life just ok but but good enough "about 4 hours if on constant playing...Now WINDOWS 8 "I HATE IT WITH PASSION"...it's a mix between android tablets, windows XP, and and windows office..the apps are the most annoying unnecessary waste of time and space it is by far the worse NEW version of windows ever....BTW they do not offer aero glass "the clear windows so therefor the task bars look like windows XP....it does have a couple of new things but the setup is honestly STUPID....BUT the actual computer in this case GATEWAY...absolutely stoning...

Reviews.Title: laptop
Reviews.Author: JuJu
Reviews.Content: I love this laptop.Just what I wanted and works wonderfully for what I wanted. Surf,email,shopping and Skype. I highly recommend  this laptop

Reviews.Title: RE/Gateway lap tot computer.
Reviews.Author: David Kelley
Reviews.Content: This is probably the best lap top I have ever used,it is very fast and windows 8 is great.Very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: john trickle
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical at first because of windows 8.Once I got used to it is OK.I by passed the log in which is a big pain.I deleted my Microsoft account which is another pain.The more I work with it the more comfortable I feel.

Reviews.Title: Gateway
Reviews.Author: Sakhile Padi
Reviews.Content: Still getting used to it, but I am happy so far. Norton came with it but I still got viruses. So I upgraded my antivirus and all is good

Reviews.Title: Love my Gateway Laptop
Reviews.Author: Sarah A Munoz
Reviews.Content: I love my laptop, I had to get use to the difference of login of, but orther than that I'm enjoying it very much.Thanks;sarahamunoz@yahoo.com

Reviews.Title: loveeee it
Reviews.Author: Paige Moren
Reviews.Content: this laptop does everything it needs to do. i love the keyboard, and i love windows 8. the cd burner works quickly,i t charges pretty quickly and it works really well with my speakers. im in love.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Computer
Reviews.Author: Raul Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: It is a great computer, just great. I like it, i liked windows 8, it is a great OS great integration with internet

Reviews.Title: Wow what can I say, awesome laptop
Reviews.Author: Mark  MacNiven
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this laptop, I thought windows 8 was going to be difficult to learn but it's really not when you swtich to customize it. it's also very fast and reliable works like a charm my husband loves it too. very fast delivery, thank you!:)

Reviews.Title: excellent quality
Reviews.Author: Asch
Reviews.Content: excellent qualitythis item was most better than I expected,Like this item there are many product, but I recommended. This is cheaper than other brands and is the same quality

Reviews.Title: Not Complete Junk
Reviews.Author: Pignutr
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop to replace an aging one for my wife.  First, Windows 8 on a laptop without a touchscreen is very frustrating to use.  Second, I routinely have problems entering her password, the touch pad seems to be so sensitive that it moves the cursor while typing.  The case is very thin and is easy to bend, not sure if it will break, but be careful.In a single sentence, we bought this laptop new and it does not get used!

Reviews.Title: very simple and amazing
Reviews.Author: mistafa karamoko
Reviews.Content: sent it to my sister in africa and she loves it. And the new windows 8 I am satisfied and happy

Reviews.Title: Just what we need!
Reviews.Author: Rodrigo O. Almosara
Reviews.Content: My son enjoyed the new laptop.  It really helped him a lot in preparing for his messages and in communicating with friends.

Reviews.Title: Good Price.
Reviews.Author: krantawi
Reviews.Content: I'm very familiar with Gateway PCs laptops and desktops.Bought this one for a friend an he is happy with it price wise.

Reviews.Title: For the price
Reviews.Author: James K. Blouin
Reviews.Content: Decent little computer for the price.  Def feels a bit cheap but it does the job.  For the price you can't go wrong

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: David Goodman
Reviews.Content: Wonderful! Would certainly make another purchase here. I am completely satisfied and the computer has worked extremely well. Very Nice!

Reviews.Title: Nice laptop
Reviews.Author: maricea
Reviews.Content: Thats a great laptop for the price! it works really fast, but it seems like having problems conecting to wifi, and windows 8 isn't great either!Other then that you get what you pay for!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: Great computer for the price. Excellent for school but fast enough for some games (if set to the lowest setting) def wouldn't recomend it if gaming is what your looking for but for school with a game here and there, you can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Computer
Reviews.Author: DW Jones
Reviews.Content: Great laptop just as I thought it would be. My wife loves it. It was shipped fast and was exactly as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Gateway Laptop
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Matthews
Reviews.Content: The product arrived on time and in perfect, brand-new condition. I have had no problems with my computer and I absolutely love it. I would order from this seller again. Windows 8 kinda sucks, but nothing to be done about that.

Reviews.Title: Ultimate
Reviews.Author: Edgar Noronha
Reviews.Content: It was the first time I happened to hear the brand GATEWAY. But subsequent to the purchase, I have forgotten rest of the brands !! It is a fantastic brand, aweinspiring speed. Performance is more than words can describe. In fact, just about to order 2 more !

Reviews.Title: Just right for a starter laptop.
Reviews.Author: Crystal Grobe-Seely
Reviews.Content: This laptop isn't top of the line in any one category, but a s whole it works pretty well.  It was a gift for my 11 year old on her birthday.  It was refurbished (but in like-new condition) and it has enough RAM and a fast enough processor for her to play Sims.  It's a good tool for helping her to develop her computer skills and I wouldn't hesitate to purchase it again.

Reviews.Title: Price Great - Quality Lacking
Reviews.Author: Robert Hagel Sr.
Reviews.Content: I have had this laptop for about 9 months. Only after a few weeks the laptop would not recognize the DVD player. The solution was to completely restore Windows 8 wiping out everything on the hard drive. Reloading all the software and files took much of a Saturday. Recently, my keyboard began typing several letters for each key struck. At times it typed on its own without stopping. Now the keyboard mut be replaced. This is my first Gateway in many years and will be my last one as reliability is too important to me.One good thing that Gateway did is to put a START button back on the bottom of the Windows 8 desktop as Microsoft had gotten rid of it. I find it very useful as Windows 8 is very clumsy.

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: Howard W. Tennyson
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my new Gateway very much. I took it to my local PC shop and had them clean all the unnecessary programs including Norton and had them install ESET NOD3 Antivirus and Microsoft Office.  It runs great and has a fabulous picture quality. I use it mainly for work applications but recently purchased Microsoft Flight Sim X and installed it on the Gateway and it has no problem running this intense memory hog program.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: sherome robinson
Reviews.Content: the laptop is great still getting the hand of Windows 8.  The speakers are low no matter how high i turn up the volume still the not loud enough.

Reviews.Title: pretty cool
Reviews.Author: Angelo Valentino
Reviews.Content: Well, takes a little getting used to windows 8 but overall very happy with the gateway laptop, its an upgrade from my 4 year old gateway desktop,good products.

Reviews.Title: Light, Fast, reliable
Reviews.Author: Ali Elahinejad
Reviews.Content: This is an inexpensive but reliable laptop.  It is well built.  The size and weight is perfect for carrying around

Reviews.Title: Love this!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Malkie
Reviews.Content: I love this laptop! I have had it for about 2 weeks and can't wait to use it more! Even better after you see the price!

Reviews.Title: Hate Hate Windows 8
Reviews.Author: Hate Hate Windows 8
Reviews.Content: Don't buy any computer with the Windows 8 operating system installed.  It was made for tablet-type products and is a complete, utter disaster for laptop and desktop applications.  I am a long-time heavy user of Windows products and, ironically, believe Windows 7 one of the best operating systems anywhere.  Windows 8 is more than frustrating, it is infuriating.  And don't think you can buy a computer with Windows 8 then just have Windows 7 installed as several close friends say this doesn't always work.  Your best bet is to buy a computer with Windows 7 already installed or go to Apple.

Reviews.Title: It works so slowly and has lots of errors
Reviews.Author: Chad Kim
Reviews.Content: Whenever I try to use internet web browser, it will say there is an error and I have to close it every 5 minutes. It annoys me so much

Reviews.Title: Non disclosure of sales terms
Reviews.Author: Brien Kroeger
Reviews.Content: Stay away from Amazon for this laptop!  I purchased this laptop and Amazon did NOT disclose they drop ship through USA NOTEBOOK of Pompano Beach Fl.  They furthermore do not disclose that USA Notebook only allows 7 days for you to return the computer, and this includes SHIPPING TIME!  I am being screwed by USA Notebook on a return.  The computer is junk.  It freezes up, it kicks your connections off line, and it does very strange things concerning access on websites.Amazon should disclose the USA Notebook terms of sale.  So if you buy on Tuesday, and it takes three days for shipping, you won't get it until the following Monday. The Commercial invoice will be dated on Tuesday before you receive it, leaving you one day for a return! USA Notebook should allow 7 days from receipt of the laptop, not from their date on their commercial invoice!  Just don't buy this computer through USA Notebook and specifically through Amazon!

Reviews.Title: DO NOT PURCHASE A GATEWAY!!!!
Reviews.Author: Brandon Reed
Reviews.Content: Do not get a gateway computer!!! Keys are falling off keyboard, shuts down all the time for no reason, black part around the screen is falling off and it does not have as much storage space as I thought it did. I use my computer for online college because my husband is in the army, It never connects to my schools website when my phone, his hp laptop etc will connect there. I hate my laptop and will be purchasing a new brand very very soon. I will never get another gateway again.

Reviews.Title: Try a dell
Reviews.Author: Michael Walker
Reviews.Content: slow and did not work. had to return it to the seller. I would not buy this one. Try dell

Reviews.Title: Don't buy.WAY TOO CHEAP
Reviews.Author: walker2000
Reviews.Content: I bought five months ago and now the keyboard went out. NEVER again will I buy on line for laptop.  I thought the reason it was cheap was because it didn't come with window's  office program. BUT NO it was made cheaply. I should have brought apple laptop. After a few years I could see something like this happen but in five months please. Ps the warranty. is only 90 days.

Reviews.Title: I really like it.
Reviews.Author: Douglas A. Eid "The Male Elementary School Te...
Reviews.Content: Beautiful screen, fast, my only complaints are the teeter totter pad buttons and F buttons wreck gaming. I'm not thrilled with Windows 8 either.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Dante Roig
Reviews.Content: It is exactly as I expected. I can recommend to other to buy this product, this is the second Gateway that I bought.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Rose
Reviews.Content: I like it a lot it's nice it a lot but it gets messed up sometimes because of how it deletes my stuff but the good thing is I still can find it in the computer.

Reviews.Title: simple i love it
Reviews.Author: Roshane Spencer
Reviews.Content: this is my dream its clean, neat, easy access great, this is a very neat laptop it serves the purpose.... i was worth the price and am very please.....

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: P. Burger
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent laptop for the price. It is light weight and compact yet has somewhat larger keys and a nice size screen. I could not be happier!

Reviews.Title: MY LAPTOP
Reviews.Author: Beverley Pomeroy  Beverley Pomeroy
Reviews.Content: i LOVE MY LAPTOP... IT WAS HERE WHEN IT SHOULD HAVE BEEN AND IT HAS BEEN MY BEST FRIEND SINCE.....

Reviews.Title: Great computer for the price
Reviews.Author: Jeff S
Reviews.Content: Lots of extra stuff that most computers in this price range do not have.. Like HDMI port!  Very pleased with this laptop.

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it!
Reviews.Author: James Sagona "The Voice"
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a laptop for general use around the home.  Years ago I had Gateway computers and always liked them.  I am pleased with the performance of this unit.  Windows 8 took a little getting used to.

Reviews.Title: yes!
Reviews.Author: nesam
Reviews.Content: this is a freakin sweet comp, love the windows 8 love style of the laptop, gateway did very good and im glad I spent the money on this.

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: Danelle Jackson
Reviews.Content: Happy with purchase. The computer was shipped as scheduled! Even though windows 8 is a little more complicated than expected.

Reviews.Title: A Good Investment
Reviews.Author: Walt O.
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the NE56R34u laptop. Since it is my first laptop I cannot judge from other models. The first thing I did was upgrade the ram to 8 gigs which made it very speedy. I also upgraded to windows 8 pro and now this baby screams.Even though this has a low-end Pentium processor it works for what I need it to do which is word processing, email, watching videos and light web browsing. Cannot go wrong for the price ( 320.00 ) from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: 6 month review
Reviews.Author: Christoph64
Reviews.Content: It's nice to have a laptop that doesn't burn your lap.  It's taken a little while to figure out Windows 8, but once you learn the secrets it's OK.  I also like the smooth finger pad vs. those with the tiny holes.  I initially rated this computer 4 stars but it was lowered to 3 stars because what you see on the screen when looking at a picture you're going to print is NOT what you get printed out.  When I print pictures from this computer they are either very dark or oversaturated.  The reason, I think, is because the colors on the laptop screen are not as vibrant as the actual colors on the photo.  And so I was increasing the saturation and adjusting the colors, in Windows Photo-Gallery, to make the pictures look normal.  This resulted in oversaturated and dark photo prints even though on the Gateway screen it looked fine.  Most of the pictures I download from my camera onto this computer seem dull in color and needing the saturation increased. There is no way to increase the saturation of the screen, only the brightness.  I have an older Dell desktop which accurately shows the colors of the downloaded photos and what the colors and brightness will be when you print them out.  So I have to use the Dell and can't use this Gateway for photo editing and printing which is inconveniant.  Otherwise this computer has worked fine.  But next time I'll buy a laptop that will have a 'What you see is what you get' view of photos.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Mickie L. Andersen
Reviews.Content: This computer was a Christmas gift for my grandson.  Unfortunately it would not stay turned on but we were able to return it with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Was a gift for the grandsons
Reviews.Author: Arthur W. Hechler
Reviews.Content: I've owned Gateways for a very long time, so in November I decided to purchase for the grandsons 3 Gateway notebooks with Win8, so far they have adapted to the new Windows and have heard of no problems. I know that the original Gateway was taken over by another company and it appears that after 2 months of use all is well, so besides a great one day price from Amazon, our grandsons are pleased with the Gateway notebooks. If they're happy, then I'm happy.

Reviews.Title: Great computer, great price.
Reviews.Author: Annie Carbutt
Reviews.Content: I have no complaints about this laptop. It was an amazing price and the computer meets all of my needs. Plus it looks expensive and it's not;)

Reviews.Title: Boy friend loves it
Reviews.Author: Fufu
Reviews.Content: He was so happy to get it... i am a bit confused with windows 8th but it is a new format and something i think i will have fun learning to used,,, he may lose his laptop to me for a few days LOL

Reviews.Title: OK for price
Reviews.Author: Delicious
Reviews.Content: The computer itself is decent considering the price.  A little slow at basic tasks.  Windows 8 is pure garbage avoid at all costs.

Reviews.Title: Very good buy for the price.
Reviews.Author: Rose Mora "Redflower"
Reviews.Content: This is a good computer for the casual user.  It has good memory and disk space. I bought it as a gift.

Reviews.Title: windows 8 is real crap
Reviews.Author: darrell caraway
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop and then noticed it had windows 8 I thought it would be like windows7 or xp, but it is so screwy.it's a headach to use. it should come with a windows 7 or xp cd and I would like to know if they will do something about it. Darrell Caraway.  update i have now had this laptop for five mounths,it has crashed so many times,nothing works with it,and if i ever buy another pc it sure wont have windows 8

Reviews.Title: SLOW WIFI!
Reviews.Author: PinheadGunpowder
Reviews.Content: Its not just you other reviewer, I just bought this crap at target for 350 bucks total with tax and I will be returning it tonight. It is so slow its like those old AOL phone lines! DO NOT BUY THIS IF U ARE USING IT FOR WIFI!!! Windows 8 is also awful!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Products must be plug and play these days. I don't want to have to go through a lot of trouble to use the internet
Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: Frequent issues using internet dependent apps despite being connected to the internet. When placed side by side with my other internet devices it consistently failed while they would work.

Reviews.Title: WHAT THE ?????????????????
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: I can't really say anything bad about the computer because I can't get it to do anything.  It seems that it doesn't have any software installed.  It has apps and charms and no software to do anything.  Windows 8 is horrible.  All the apps want you to buy something.  This might be a good computer for a 14 year old girl with all the social network stuff but for an adult forget it.  If I am going to keep this computer I will have to dump Windows 8 and put an older operating system in it to make it useable.  I am really unhappy with this laptop.Just wanted to give an update.  The problem with windows 8 is it is for a touchscreen device not for a laptop or desktop computer.  I kept this computer because it was my fault, I should have researched Windows 8 more.  Now it will cost me more to buy an older operating system.  From what I have been hearing Windows 7 is a much better OS (my last computer has XP on it).  I think 8 is a change for the sake of change (and to make more money).  Do yourself a favor and do more research than I did.  My advice is just buy a laptop with windows 7.

Reviews.Title: works as i was expecting it
Reviews.Author: Angel Dorantes
Reviews.Content: Arrivede in a short amount of time and works perfectly, it's fast and not hevy at all. I really like it
